levels.description:
Increases the ATK of the next attack to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</>; The attack will target <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> targets, and each attack will jump between at most <@ba.vup>{chain.max_target}</> enemies
<@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charges</>

<@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charges</>
